preface.title: Preface
preface.para: Developing enterprise software applications with security requirements can be a cumbersome and error-prone process. In such applications often the security is spread all over the application code. This makes it difficult to understand how things work and hard to maintain security in such code.

JPA Security provides an interface to define security requirements of your Data Access Layer at a single place in code for ease of usability and maintainability. It is designed to extend current security solutions like JavaEE Security and Spring Security (formerly known as Acegi-Security), but may be used on its own, too. It enables applications to control access to JPA Entity Beans based on the currently authenticated user and/or its roles in the application.
